title: Rental Payment Tracker
description: Track rental payments, electricity usage, and prepayments

deletePaymentEntry.title: Delete Payment Entry
deletePaymentEntry.description: Are you sure you want to delete this payment entry? This action cannot be undone.

unlinkWalletTransaction.title: Unlink Wallet Transaction
unlinkWalletTransaction.description: Are you sure you want to unlink the wallet transaction? The payment amount will be restored from the wallet transaction.

payment.title: No payment entries yet
payment.description: Get started by creating your first payment entry.

walletModule.title: Wallet Module Not Found
walletModule.description: Please install the Wallet Module to enable this feature.

walletTemplates.title: No Expense Templates Found
walletTemplates.description: Please create expense templates for house rental payment in the Wallet Module to use this feature.

linkWalletQuery.title: Search Wallet Transactions
linkWalletQuery.description: Search for wallet transactions to link with this payment entry.

noTransactionFound.title: No transactions found
noTransactionFound.description: Try adjusting your search to find what you're looking for.

transactionLinked.title: Transaction already linked
transactionLinked.description: This field is disabled because the payment entry is already linked to a wallet transaction. If you wish to change the amount paid, please change it via the linked wallet transaction.

toast.deletePaymentEntryFailed: Failed to delete the payment entry.
